mapper.sql: ID, BORROW_TASK_ID, ARCHIVE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, BORROW_CNT, COMMENT
mapper.insert: insert into t_archive_borrow_detail (ID, BORROW_TASK_ID, ARCHIVE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE, BORROW_CNT, COMMENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_archive_borrow_detail
BORROW_TASK_ID = #{borrowTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVE_TYPE = #{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BORROW_CNT = #{borrowCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_archive_borrow_detail set BORROW_TASK_ID = #{borrowTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARCHIVE_TYPE = #{archiveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BORROW_CNT = #{borrowCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.DICT_DATA_NAME as FILE_NAME_DESC from t_archive_borrow_detail a left join SYS_DICT_DATA b on a.FILE_NAME = b.DICT_DATA_CODE where BORROW_TASK_ID = #{borrowId}
